svg.text: plan-first workflow • raycloudtools smart filter • tests + rollback

g.font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', 'Courier New', monospace

text.tspan: > Plan a “smart filter” (no code yet). Include scoring, CLI, tests, performance. Cite files.
1) Add raylib/rayconfidence.{h,cpp} to compute confidence per bounded ray
2) Confidence = w1 * intensity(alpha) + w2 * exp(-mahalanobis²) + w3 * neighbour_count
3) Keep all unbounded rays (alpha==0), filter bounded rays by threshold or keep-top-percent
5) Wire tool into raycloudtools/CMakeLists.txt and new subdir CMakeLists.txt
6) Add gtest in tests/raytest/raytests.cpp to lock behaviour
• create synthetic room (raycreate room 1), inject outliers (single isolated bounded points)
• assert: bounded ray count decreases, unbounded ray count unchanged, output deterministic
• over-filtering thin structures (mitigate: keep-top-percent mode + expose params)
• perf on huge clouds (mitigate: kNN once; reuse surfel results; avoid extra copies)
tool is additive; existing tools unchanged; revert commit if needed
